name: Prisoners in Space (CosmicDrifter55)
description:
Objective: Alien galactic patrols who are attempting to take over the galaxy have captured and imprisoned a colony of space colonists who were on their way to Alpha Centauri. Your mission is to rescue as many of the colonists as you can in your spaceship.

The colonist are imprisoned within the clusters of blocks that you will be approaching. Fire your missiles to destroy each block and rescue the falling colonist before they get too far from you.

Beware though; not all of the blocks are occupied by colonists. Some are empty and some are housed with missiles that will destroy you on impact.

You will receive an extra turn if you rescue ALL the prisoners in each level. 

This game is in it's early stages of development. Future releases may have more enemies and levels. Ultimately, there will be an end game level; where you will have to take on the Mother Ship and all of it's fire power. As of now, they're only 10 playing levels, with each level being more challenging.

This game plays best with a controller or a gamepad. If you're using the keyboard, than these are the keys to use:

Left Arrow or A Key: Move left.

Right Arrow or D Key: Move right.

Up Arrow or W Key: Move upwards.

B Key: Upward thrust.

Space Bar; Fire missiles.

If you're using a controller:

Left Stick: Move left and right and up.

A Button: Fire missiles.

Right Trigger: Upward thrust.

You can pause the game by pressing the "P" key while in gameplay. 

Good luck and may the Force be with you. 😋

Note: There will be a Windows and Mac version released in the future. This HTML5 version is made for demonstration purposes only.
